name: About Me
body:
Hi. I'm Nuttanart Pornprasitsakul or you can call me Tap. I'm a programmer who favor on product quality and life happiness. Full-time Ruby on Rails and CoffeeScript developer at [Viki](http://www.viki.com). Do some functional programming (Clojure,Elixir) as a hobby.

I know a little bit about Object-Oriented design, Test-driven development, Developer testing, API design, Agile development practices and I have a little bit of experiences on Unix, Redis, Backbone.js, PostgreSQL, Git and Java.

### Find out more about me
[Engligh blog](http://visibletrap.blogger.com) where I note down technical solutions of the problems I have encoutered there and sometimes do programming post.

[Thai blog](http://visibletrap.wordpress.com) for software development experiences, programing stuffs and life.

[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/nuttanart) for more formal profile

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/visibletrap) I tweet there!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
